questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Maritime and port activities

Where was the photo taken?
A) In a city park
B) At the beach
C) At a port
D) Inside a museum

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) A port
D) A family gathering

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A large building
B) A cruise ship
C) People walking
D) A park

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A playground
B) A cruise ship
C) A busy street
D) A mountain range

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A small boat
B) A cruise ship
C) A park bench
D) A statue

What is the relationship between the cruise ship and the port?
A) The cruise ship is anchored at the port
B) The cruise ship is sailing away from the port
C) The cruise ship is being built at the port
D) The cruise ship is being dismantled at the port

What body of water is visible in the photo?
A) A river
B) A lake
C) The ocean
D) A pond

How many cruise ships are visible in the photo?
A) None
B) One
C) Two
D) Three

What is the color of the cruise ship?
A) Red
B) Blue
C) White and Gray
D) Yellow

Are there any other vessels visible in the photo besides the cruise ship?
A) Yes
B) No

What is the condition of the water in the photo?
A) Rough
B) Calm
C) Frozen
D) Polluted

What is the orientation of the cruise ship in relation to the port?
A) Perpendicular
B) Parallel
C) Diagonal
D) At an angle

Are there any people visible in the photo?
A) Yes
B) No

What is the position of the cruise ship's bow?
A) Facing the port
B) Facing the open water
C) Facing another ship
D) Facing a dock

Are there any vehicles visible in the photo?
A) Yes
B) No

What is the shape of the port area?
A) Circular
B) Rectangular
C) Triangular
D) Irregular

Are there any cranes visible in the photo?
A) Yes
B) No
